name: Flutter Development Environment
postCreateCommand: sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y git wget unzip clang cmake ninja-build pkg-config libgtk-3-dev && git clone https://github.com/flutter/flutter.git --depth 1 --branch stable /workspaces/flutter-sdk && echo 'export PATH="$PATH:/workspaces/flutter-sdk/bin"' >> ~/.bashrc && /workspaces/flutter-sdk/bin/flutter doctor
